name: Smartwaiver.com
overview:
Headquartered in the beautiful Central Oregon city of Bend, Smartwaiver began as a perfect solution for streamlining the release forms needed for sports-based activities. Now, the company is servicing customers with a wide variety of customizable waivers.

Co-founders Andy Laakmann and Mark Silliman are serial entrepreneurs with an eye for simple solutions for everyday business problems. Getting to the fun as quickly as possible was an important goal, and they also saw a need for a safe, simplistic, high-tech way to serve both clients and businesses alike.

Smartwaiver offers custom digital waivers safely stored in the WaiverVault. Waivers can be signed and sent from home, from mobile devices and from waiver kiosks, which enables clients to skip the paperwork and quickly and securely begin their activity of choice.
